subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Doctor finds spiders in boy's ear
A doctor in the United States discovered a pair of spiders had made a home in the ear of a 9-year-old boy who complained of an earache.

Degree lost over MySpace photo
